name: Remember When (itch)
description:
"Remember When" is an interactive Narrative Experience created by a team of Abertay Univesity students using GameMaker Studio 2.

Remember When is meant to be experienced in a single sitting and it takes roughly 30 minutes.

                                      

STORY

The story follows a phone call of Noah and his wife, Sarah, recalling pivotal moments in their relationship.

Peer into Noah's memories and relive their happiest memories together  through choice based dialogue, a unique art-style,  and an original soundtrack in a fully Voice Acted experience.

                                       

CONTROLS

Mouse: Move in a point and click fashion.

Left Click: Make dialogue choices.

ESC: End the Game

Backspace: Skips to the next scene. (Highly advised to ONLY be used on the second playthrough to see different choices and ending.)

                             

FOLLOW US

You can follow us on twitter for anything regarding Remember When!

This is our first game and any feedback would be greatly appreciated.

We look forward to hearing everyone's impressions of our game.
